scripts.start: node scripts/set-config.js --dev && concurrently "yarn start:src" "yarn start:neu" -c gray,white -n src,neu
scripts.build: node scripts/set-config.js && yarn build:src && yarn build:app && node scripts/post-build.js
scripts.build:github: node scripts/set-config.js && vite build --base=/sermon-presenter && node scripts/post-build.js
scripts.upgrade:neu: yarn upgrade @neutralinojs/neu neutralinojs-types && neu update && neu version
